attributes.action: Make women's sanitary ware exempt from V.A.T.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Make women's sanitary ware exempt from V.A.T."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12900.asp

Prime Minister's Office
